title: The Best Ways To Pack A Suitcase
text:
Image: Getty Images

When it comes to flying, nobody wants to pay excess baggage fees. Unfortunately, fitting everything into one or two suitcases can be difficult; especially if you're going to be abroad for more than a week. With that in mind, here are eight space-saving hacks that will help you cram more into your allotted baggage allowances without breaking stuff in the process.

The infographic below comes from the Canadian travel site Travelblog. It breaks down the various ways you can maximise space in your suitcase via simple folding and compartmentalising. I'll definitely be employing a few of these on my next trip abroad. I feel like an idiot for not thinking of the shoe hack before. Never again will that space be neglected!

[Via Travelblog]
